innovate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to start to use new ideas, methods, or inventions
innovate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the need for large businesses to innovate
The company has successfully innovated new products and services.
innovate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to design and develop new and original products
innovate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: He accused the company of being conservative and reluctant to innovate.
